snippet: Martin Brodeur made 16 saves in what might have been his last start in a 20-year career with the Devils and New Jersey beat Boston 3-2 on Sunday as the Bruins rested many of their stars in preparation for the playoffs later this week....

headline.print_headline: Brodeur Wins What Might Be Final Start for Devils
headline.main: Brodeur Wins What Might Be Final Start for Devils

lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur made 16 saves in what might have been his last start in a 20-year career with the Devils and New Jersey beat Boston 3-2 on Sunday as the Bruins rested many of their stars in preparation for the playoffs later this week.
